title: China calls the U.S. a repeat abuser of world trade rules
text:
China calls the U.S. a repeat abuser of world trade rules Thursday, March 22, 2018 - 01:49 
China accuses the United States of ''repeatedly abusing'' trade practices, as Beijing braces for an imminent announcement from U.S. President Donald Trump slapping more tariffs on Chinese imports.   
China accuses the United States of "repeatedly abusing" trade practices, as Beijing braces for an imminent announcement from U.S. President Donald Trump slapping more tariffs on Chinese imports.  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/03/22/china-calls-the-us-a-repeat-abuser-of-wo?videoId=411129630&videoChannel=13423
